title: ADM Capital Europe Seeks $800 Million for Food and Agriculture Investing
sub_head: The London firm invests in sustainable businesses through its Cibus strategy
body:
ADM Capital Europe expects to collect at least $800 million across two funds to make investments in the food and agriculture sectors, according to people familiar with the matter.
The London-based investment firm is aiming to raise $600 million for Cibus Fund II LP, which takes majority and minority positions in midsize companies across the developed world, the people said. The firm is also seeking $200 million for Cibus Enterprise Fund II LP, which invests in late-stage agrifood technology startups, they said.
